TeleDirect: The Leader in Outsourced Lead Generation

Lead Generation Services | Outbound Lead Generation Service for B2B & SAAS | Lead Management Call Center & More!

Finding the perfect balance between your call center performance and lead generation is a challenge for any business; you want your call center to handle a heavy workload, but you don’t want to overburden your infrastructure with additional lead qualification or lead generation services.

It’s a problem that has vexed firms ever since call centers became a prominent part of customer service. But with TeleDirect’s outbound B2B lead generation services and other sales-focused resources, finding that perfect balance is easier than ever!

At TeleDirect, we realize the inherent juxtaposition with wanting to satisfy current customers while prospecting for new ones. And thanks to our B2B lead generation services with call center leads, your answering service can be modified to offer value you never thought possible.  Our call center leads allow you to cost effectively generate additional sales opportunities and keep your sales team focused on selling rather than chasing deals. This simple shift delivers a high return on time and often shifts our service from an expense you need to a profit center you can’t do without. See how our B2B lead generation services can help today – just complete our customer contact form!

How a B2B Lead Generation Call Center Improves Business Opportunities

In theory, a call answering service is the perfect outlet to enhance your sales activity. Most answering services are ripe with potential to support your sales efforts. After all, they have the automated dialing technology, man power, operational oversight and specific focus you wish you had the time and resources to deploy sales efforts with.  Yet in practical application, few business process outsourcing (BPO) firms are able to capitalize on this considerable potential to create lead generation services. TeleDirect’s call center platform isn’t just a client communication application – it’s a lead generation call center as well!

Call center leads are always there – but do you have the lead generation services in place to capture new business opportunities? TeleDirect’s outbound lead generation service for B2B with our software-as-a-service (SAAS) call center platform and other tools!

TeleDirect also provides:

  • Outsourced B2B lead generation – our prospecting experts and BPO services, along with continuous call center leads, will help drive further business, even as you’re dealing with current clients.
  • Lead verification – sifting through the “noise” of 24/7 lead generation can be confusing. That’s why TeleDirect’s lead verification services and B2B lead generation call center rapidly process inquiries about your products and services. Lead generation services are all about timing, and TeleDirect delivers timely results each and every time!
  • Continued engagement – a lead gen call center is only as good as its support structure. With built-in engagement channels (social media, surveys, etc.) and other outsourced lead generation techniques, TeleDirect helps keep your customers engaged and informed with timely, well-planned contact.
  • Lead conversion – once your potential customers have been sourced and engaged, it’s time to close the deal. Outsourced lead generation is only the first part of the sales equation. Converting leads requires a professional touch, not to mention the expertise to instill trust and confidence in your customers – regardless of your industry. TeleDirect shows the way with smart, sustainable outbound lead generation services for B2B with our SAAS and other practical solutions!

Lead Qualification Services & Lead Generation Outsourcing – Get TeleDirect’s Expertise

If your business needs help with a lead generation call center, or if you’re interested in optimizing your call center leads, contact TeleDirect today. Enjoy all the advantages of a lead gen call center without compromising your existing business objectives! With TeleDirect’s proven outbound B2B lead generation capability, your call center will have more flexibility and become a superior sales support tool.

TeleDirect’s complete line of BPO strategies, including lead generation outsourcing, improves your overall customer satisfaction rates. But  to focus on customer service, you first have to engage and retain potential clients. Our b2b lead generation services have helped many firms, and we can help yours, too!

To connect with one of our lead generation call center consultants, please call us at (800) 776-1081. You can also complete our client contact form and one of our representatives will be in touch. If you don’t get started today, your competition surely will.

Thanks for visiting TeleDirect, the best call center and the leader in lead generation services! We look forward to speaking with you soon about your lead management call center requirements.
